commits.content:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ForgotPasswordForm = () => { return (
{/* Left Image */}
{/* Right Form */}
{/* Heading */}

Forgot Your Password?

Type the email you used to sign up on West Brook and we’ll send you a password reset email.

{/* Email Input */}
{/* Send Reset Email Button */}
{/* Go Back to Login */}
Go back to{" "} LOGIN
); }; export default ForgotPasswordForm;
